title: Ideogram — AI Tool Review
description: Ideogram is an AI image generator specialized in creating images with accurate, readable text — solving the text-in-image problem that plagues other AI tools. Ideogram is an AI image generation tool that excels at the one thing most image AI fails at: generating images with accurate, legible text. It's perfect for creating logos, posters, social media graphics, and marketing materials where text in the image must be readable. Ideogram 2.0 added photorealism and improved overall image quality alongside its text rendering strengths. Highlights: Best text-in-image accuracy of any AI tool. Photorealistic image quality. Free tier available. Design-focused outputs. Fast generation.
